definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: That was one dent in the dam-like Berlin Wall, and a big one.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙堤坝出现了凹陷，一个严重的凹陷。

sentences.english: The fall of the belin wall marked the dawn of new era in European history.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙的倒塌，标志着欧洲新历史的到来。

sentences.english: Only then could the cement wall collapse in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 在当时，正是这一点注定了柏林墙的倒塌。

sentences.english: The Berlin Wall symbolized a world divided and it defined an entire era.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙象征着一个分隔的世界，代表一个时代。

sentences.english: They banded the Berlin Wall in light and dark grey stone.
sentences.chinese: 他们用淡灰色和深灰色的石头砌成了柏林墙。

sentences.english: The wall through Berlin was finally ruptured, prefiguring the reunification of Germany.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙终于倒塌了，预示着德国的重新统一。

sentences.english: No, I was not in Berlin the night the Wall fell.
sentences.chinese: 不过，在柏林墙崩溃的那天晚上我不在柏林。

sentences.english: For the first time since the fall of the Berlin Wall, an ongoing Olympic rival reshapes up.
sentences.chinese: 从柏林墙倒塌开始，奥运比赛的竞争愈演烈。

sentences.english: Two decades after the fall of the Berlin Wall, is Cuban communism finally on the way out?
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙倒掉二十年后，古巴社会主义步其后尘吗？

sentences.english: Opening the wall was a moment of history that finally led to German re-unification.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙的开放是历史性的一刻，最终促成了德国统一。

sentences.english: Twenty years after its fall, the Berlin Wall still evokes a variety of painful images.
sentences.chinese: 在柏林墙倒塌20年后，很多痛苦景象依然历历在目。

sentences.english: The Wall represented an artificially divided Germany and a dangerously bifurcated world.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙代表着被人为分裂的德国和危险割据的世界。

sentences.english: The Wall ran in front of the historic landmark.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙跑到这座历史性地标前边。

sentences.english: The line of cobblestones marks where the Wall used to run.
sentences.chinese: 鹅软石组成的线标志着当年的柏林墙。

sentences.english: Years after the fall of the Berlin Wall, he returned to the same sites, camera in hand.
sentences.chinese: 后来柏林墙倒塌，数年后，他带着相机故地重游。

definition: East and West Germany/refers to the German Democratic Republic (East Germany) and the Federal Republic of Germany (West Germany)
East Germany (1945-1990)/German Democratic Republic 德意志民主共和國|德意志民主共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2]
Sarajevo, capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina
Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980

pinyin: Jie2 ke4 Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4
De2 yi4 zhi4 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: West Germany/German Federal Republic 德意志聯邦共和國|德意志联邦共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Lian2 bang1 Gong4 he2 guo2]
two Germanies/refers to German Democratic Republic (East Germany) and the Federal Republic of Germany (West Germany)
